It is, but I'm a little unclear as to how it works.

I basically run a job =
order for about 4 hours, and then checkpoint and
terminate the job. The nex=
t day I recover that job, and continue with
the crawl. I repeat this until =
the job has finished.

If I create map of data/uri from the extractor, then=
 I assume that
data will be lost. So I need to somehow have it saved and re=
loaded
when performing a checkpoint.

Is there a plug-in way of doing this?=


> That might be tricky. Is checkpointing something to you can use?
